title: Loving Leila
description: 𝑻𝒉𝒊𝒔 𝒃𝒐𝒐𝒌 𝒊𝒔 𝒄𝒖𝒓𝒓𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒍𝒚 𝒏𝒐𝒕 𝒂𝒗𝒂𝒊𝒍𝒂𝒃𝒍𝒆. 𝑰𝒕 𝒊𝒔 𝒊𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔 𝒐𝒇 𝒃𝒆𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒓𝒆𝒘𝒐𝒓𝒌𝒆𝒅 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒘𝒊𝒍𝒍 𝒃𝒆 𝒓𝒆𝒍𝒆𝒂𝒔𝒆 𝒊𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑭𝒂𝒍𝒍 𝒐𝒇 2024 𝒂𝒔 𝒑𝒂𝒓𝒕 𝒐𝒇 𝒂 𝒏𝒆𝒘 𝒔𝒆𝒓𝒊𝒆𝒔. 𝑺𝒐 𝒌𝒆𝒆𝒑 𝒂𝒏 𝒆𝒚𝒆 𝒐𝒖𝒕 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒊𝒕.Loving Leila is part of Kristen Proby’s With Me in Seattle UniverseWhen fate offers you a second chance, grab it with both hands.Navy SEAL Kyle “Maverick” Jackson made the biggest mistake of his life walking away from Leila Asherton five years ago. Now he's been sent on a mission to rescue hostages on a luxury cruise liner, and fate seems to be offering him a second chance when Leila turns out to be one of the hostages.Leila Asherton cannot believe her bad luck when the ship she’s on is hijacked at sea. Things seem dire until the rescue team arrives -- and then they seem bleak. The rescue team includes the man who broke her heart. Surely Lady luck can't really be this cruel.Kyle is determined to take this second chance at loving Leila. Only thing is, will Leila allow him back into her life?
author: Dorothy Ewels
